ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
if (source.getLoginHeader() == null) {
    eval(String(source.loginUrl));
    login();
}
pi=baseUrl.match(/\/p\/d\/(\d+)/);
pi=pi?pi[1]:1
$ = java.getElements(".font-select@option");
n = 0; // é»˜è®¤é€‰æ‹©æº
v = String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x = v.match(/^\d+$/) ? v : n;
x = parseInt(x) < $.length ? x : n;
java.toast(x);
// æå–ä¹¦ç±åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯
name = java.getString('[property="og:novel:book_name"]@content');
author = java.getString('[property="og:novel:author"]@content');
kind = java.getString('[property~=category|status|update_time]@content');
last = java.getString('[property~=latest_chapter_name]@content');
img = java.getString('[property="og:image"]@content');
info = "  ğŸŒ¾ç®€ä»‹ï¼š"+ java.getString('[property="og:description"]@content');

// å¤šæºæƒ…å†µå¤„ç†
if ($.length > 1) {
    y = '\nğŸ“Œä½¿ç”¨è¯´æ˜ï¼šæ ¹æ®åºå·è®¾ç½®ä¹¦ç±å˜é‡æ¥åˆ‡æ¢æ¥æº(é»˜è®¤0)ã€‚\nğŸ¯å½“å‰æºï¼šåºå·ğŸ”º' + x + 'ğŸ”»ã€' + $[x].text() + 'ã€‘' + (x == 0 ? ' (é»˜è®¤)' : '');
    for (i in $) {
        y += '\nâ¤åºå·ğŸ”º' + i + 'ğŸ”»ã€' + $[i].text() + 'ã€‘\næºåœ°å€ï¼š'+`https://www.juxiaoshuo.net/post/novel/toc?novelId=${pi}&novelFromId=${$[i].attr("value")},{"method": "POST"}`;
    }
    info += y;
}
let bookUrlz = `https://www.juxiaoshuo.net/post/novel/toc?novelId=${pi}&novelFromId=${$[x].attr("value")},{"method": "POST"}`;
if (!name || !author || !kind || !last || !img || !info) {
    java.toast("âš ï¸ä¹¦ç±ä¿¡æ¯è§£æå¤±è´¥ï¼Œå¯èƒ½æ˜¯ç½‘ç»œé—®é¢˜æˆ–ç½‘é¡µé“¾æ¥ä¸åˆæ³•ã€‚è¯·æ£€æŸ¥ç½‘é¡µé“¾æ¥æˆ–ç¨åé‡è¯•ã€‚");
}

data = {
    name: name,
    author: author,
    kind: kind,
    last: last,
    img: img,
    info: info,
    bookUrl: bookUrlz
};

// åºåˆ—åŒ–ä¸ºJSONæ ¼å¼
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: name
